title: Conferences/Workshops
body:
Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners.
Table of Contents  May 2021 June 2021 September 2021 October 2021 December 2021 Missing any conference?  May 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Kafka Summit Europe 2021 11, 12 May 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    AWS Summit India Online 2021 Postponed Register Virtual (Free) IST     June 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     JS Nation Live 18, 19 June 2021 Register Virtual (Chargeable) CEST     September 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Spring One 2021 1, 2 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Kafka Summit Americas 2021 14, 15 Sep 2021 Register[https://www.kafka-summit.org/events/kafka-summit-americas-2021/about] Virtual (Free) PST     October 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     VM World 2021 5-7 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Kubecon North America 2021. 12-15 Oct 2021 Register Los Angeles PST    All Things Open 2021 18, 19 Oct 2021 Regiser Free + In-person EST    Dashcon 2021 26, 27 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST     December 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Gophercon 2021 5-8 Dec 2021 Register  PST     Missing any conference Do raise a pull request to this repo to add/update conference information.
